title: Draft an IP Licensing Agreement
description: A corporate attorney needs to draft an agreement to license the company's patented technology to a third party.

tasks.description: Review the term sheet to understand the key business terms (e.g., royalty rate, exclusivity, territory).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts all the key commercial terms for the license.

tasks.description: Select the firm's standard patent licensing agreement template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct starting document.

tasks.description: Draft the agreement, incorporating the specific business terms into the template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a draft agreement that reflects the business deal.
